page.title: 19THEFT AT CLAWTON SCHOOL
page.content: This disk was nearly not completed because on the{9th of September 1984 the school discovered that{thieves}had cleverly broken in and stolen our {computer equipment}and all of our programmes. The{police}came in to investigate.A piece of wood was broken off a window in our classroom.They had hit the window frame and the lock came undone.The police did not find any {fingerprints}with their powder,so the {burglars}must have been wearing gloves. The school regained its full equipment on the{19th of June 1985.We ordered a new{BBC computer for the school.First came the{V.D.U. then the computer{keyboard}and finally the disk drive.After that we ordered a printer LX-80.So all's well that ends} well.
